input.sentences: a group of people is gathered in a church .
there is a church sale and bake sale going on .
the people look through all of the stuff seeing what they would like to purchase .
the people taking the picture got so excited that the picture was blurry .
everyone was very happy with their purchases .
output.sentences: On Sundays, people are gathered in the church.
The bake sale was a big success for the church.
There were lots of things to purchase that people made.
I am not very good at taking pictures of people.
Many people made purchases and left happy.
